entry.title: Facebook Stock Falls 6% After META Ticker Change
entry.summary: Since CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced the company’s name change and shift in focus, its stock has dropped by 42%.

entry.title: ‘Stranger Things’ Netflix NFTs Face Fan Backlash
entry.summary: While some enjoyed the Candy Digital minigame that awarded NFTs, others called the promotion “trash.”

entry.title: This NYC Gallery Lets NFT Owners Remotely Display Their Art From Anywhere
entry.summary: Web3 NYC Gallery’s Genesis NFTs let collectors control a display frame remotely to showcase and sell NFTs on Fifth Avenue.

entry.title: SEC Is Investigating Terra’s UST Stablecoin Collapse: Report
entry.summary: SEC attorneys may have reason to think that Terra violated federal investor-protection regulations, according to a Bloomberg report.

entry.title: Optimism Hacker Sends 1 Million Tokens to Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin
entry.summary: The hacker made away with 20 million OP tokens last week after an administrative error.

entry.title: UFC Clinches Sponsorship Deal With Blockchain Company VeChain
entry.summary: The multi-year deal between the UFC and VeChain will lead to the company's logo being displayed prominently in the Octagon.

entry.title: DexGuru Hands Power to its Users With ‘Bootstrap’ DAO Launch
entry.summary: DeFi trading terminal DexGuru is taking a novel community-first approach to launching its Decentralized Autonomous Organisation.

entry.title: Mattel to Release ‘Cryptoys’ NFTs on Flow Blockchain
entry.summary: The global toy company is partnering with OnChain Studios to bring its "iconic IP" to the metaverse.

entry.title: Do Kwon Appeal Overruled, Must Comply With SEC Investigation Into Mirror Protocol
entry.summary: The CEO and founder of Terraform Labs Do Kwon has been ordered to comply with subpoenas issued by the SEC in February.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miners Will See 29% Rate Hike on Hydroelectric Power in Washington
entry.summary: Charging Bitcoin miners the highest rate wasn't enough. Chelan County has now implemented a new crypto rate that's 29% higher.

entry.title: Ledger Nano S Plus Review: A Top Hardware Wallet Refreshed for 2022
entry.summary: Ledger's base-model hardware wallet gets a long-overdue update, adding a bigger screen and increased storage capacity.

entry.title: Former Robinhood, Button, Venmo Execs Raise $8M for NFT Company Floor
entry.summary: Former Robinhood Crypto COO Christine Brown is among the three co-founders of Floor, a new NFT portfolio app with its own member NFTs.

entry.title: Solana Challenges Poor Safety Rating From DeFi Watchdog
entry.summary: The report cites concerns about the network's crash-prone node architecture. But Solana Labs has already refuted many of the claims.

entry.title: Jay-Z and Jack Dorsey Launch 'Bitcoin Academy' at Rapper's Childhood Home in Brooklyn
entry.summary: The new Bitcoin Academy will offer classes, including "What is Cryptocurrency," to members of the Marcy Houses community where Jay-Z grew up.

entry.title: Best Crypto Wallet: The Top 8 Hardware Wallets
entry.summary: Hardware wallets are the safest way to store your cryptocurrencies securely. But which is the best option? We review the leading devices.

entry.title: Tezos Hits Four-Week High Following USDT Launch
entry.summary: The price of XTZ was quick to react to the news of USDT launching on the Tezos blockchain, soaring by 9% earlier in the day.

entry.title: Felix Capital Raises $600 Million to Boost Web3 Exposure
entry.summary: Pitched as a venture capital firm for the “creative class,” Felix Capital raised fresh funding with a focus on Web3 and crypto investments.

entry.title: What are Soulbound Tokens? Building Blocks for a Web3 Decentralized Society
entry.summary: Proposed by Ethereum creator Vitalik Buterin, Soulbound Tokens are non-transferable, non-financialized tokens for a Decentralized Society.

entry.title: New York Finance Regulator Issues Fresh Guidance on Dollar-Backed Stablecoins
entry.summary: The New York State Department of Financial Services became America’s first regulator to issue regulatory guidance for dollar-backed stablecoins.

entry.title: Tether Launches Stablecoin on Tezos to Unlock New DeFi Products
entry.summary: Tether’s USDT, the world’s largest stablecoin by market capitalization, is now available on the Tezos proof-of-stake blockchain.

entry.title: Divided ApeCoin Community Narrowly Approves Proposal to Stay on Ethereum
entry.summary: In a hotly-contested round of voting, the ApeCoin community has voted to stay on Ethereum. But not everyone’s happy.

entry.title: Ethereum Layer-2 Solution Optimism Loses 20 Million Tokens in Interlayer Snafu
entry.summary: The anonymous thief has sold off one million of the tokens as launch partner Wintermute tries to coax the hacker into cooperating.

entry.title: Edge CEO Paul Puey Talks 'Confidential' Bitcoin Mastercard Launch
entry.summary: Paul Puey, CEO of Edge Wallet, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Edge's announcement of a new "confidential" crypto Mastercard. After Edge announced the card on Wednesday, Mastercard blasted crypto media to say it has nothing to do with the product—despite Puey telling Decrypt, "MasterCard is involved in entire process. They fully approved this, it’s fully legal and approved by MasterCard. It fits entirely within their framework.”

entry.title: Anthony Hopkins Adopts Ethereum Name, Asks Snoop Dogg What NFT to Buy
entry.summary: The Oscar-winning actor starred in "Zero Contact," a film released via NFTs last year. Now he's looking to buy his first NFT.

entry.title: What Is Stepn? The ‘Move-to-Earn’ NFT App That Pays You Crypto to Exercise
entry.summary: Stepn lets users earn crypto for exercising—giving them real returns for walking, jogging or running. But gameplay is complicated.

entry.title: Madison Cawthorn Failed to Properly Disclose up to $950K in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana Trades
entry.summary: The North Carolina congressman also has been accused of a pump-and-dump scheme tied to the “Let’s Go Brandon” coin.

entry.title: Crypto Exchanges Delist Litecoin Over Privacy Feature Concerns
entry.summary: Two major exchanges in South Korea said they will delist Litecoin due to new privacy features enabled by the protocol.

entry.title: Salesforce Launching Platform for Brands to Mint and Sell NFTs
entry.summary: The cloud software giant is expecting the new platform, launching now with a pilot program, to be widely available by October.

entry.title: Before Building the Metaverse, Blockchain Needs an Operating System
entry.summary: Blockchain needs an operating system, to provide a visual metaphor that everyone can understand and operate, argues Peer CEO Tony Tran.

entry.title: Ethereum’s Merge Upgrade Goes Live Today on Ropsten Testnet
entry.summary: In a historic move, Ethereum's longest-running testnet called Ropsten is transitioning to a proof-of-stake algorithm on Wednesday.

entry.title: Maker's Decentralized Stablecoin Is Coming to Cosmos Thanks to Umee
entry.summary: The industry’s fourth-largest stablecoin is coming to Cosmos following a collaboration between cross-chain protocol Umee and the Maker team.

entry.title: Edge Announces ‘Confidential’ Bitcoin Mastercard—But Mastercard Denies Involvement
entry.summary: Wallet provider aims to empower the unbanked within the Bitcoin payment industry.

entry.title: NFTs, Crypto Gaming Still Resilient After May Market Turbulence: DappRadar
entry.summary: The new report suggests that the NFT market could decouple from financial markets in the same way art has split from the S&P 500.

entry.title: How to Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder
entry.summary: Rebecca Lamis believes negative narratives around NFTs can be quashed with education and in-person connection at places like the Quantum space in LA.

entry.title: What Are Utility NFTs? Unique Tokens Offering Real-World Benefits
entry.summary: Utility NFTs are more than just digital collectibles, affording holders privileges, rights and rewards that they wouldn’t otherwise be able to access.

entry.title: Cosmos-based DeFi Exchange Osmosis Hit by $5M Exploit
entry.summary: Osmosis, a decentralized exchange built on Cosmos, was hacked for roughly $5 million, forcing developers to halt the network.

entry.title: Chainlink Hits Four-Week High Following Updated Staking Roadmap Release
entry.summary: The price of theLINK token soared to a four-week high following Chainlink's announcement of the staking launch in the second half of 2022.

entry.title: Caitlin Long's Crypto Bank Custodia Sues Fed Over 'Master Account' Delays
entry.summary: The suit centers on the Fed’s 19-month delay in reviewing the crypto bank’s application, for a process that typically takes up to a week.

entry.title: 'Always Sunny' Actor Rob McElhenney Launches Web3 Writers Room With Ethereum NFTs
entry.summary: The “Always Sunny” star will co-create characters and stories and share in the royalties and revenue with NFT holders.

entry.title: Binance US Launches High-Yield Crypto Staking for Solana, Avalanche and More
entry.summary: The current top staking option offers APY as high as 18%.

entry.title: Budweiser’s Clydesdales Zoom Into Ethereum NFT Racing Game Zed Run
entry.summary: The beer brand’s iconic horses will zip through digital races via NFTs, with competitions and other perks ahead for owners.

entry.title: gm: Christine Brown Left Robinhood to Go Full NFT
entry.summary: Christine Brown left her perch as Robinhood Crypto COO at the end of March to launch a new crypto venture. Now she has announced her new gig: Co-founder and COO at Floor, a token-gated NFT portfolio app that has raised an $8 million seed round. She talked to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the company's plans, her own crypto and NFT bags, and her outlook on NFTs and on Robinhood.

entry.title: NBA's Spencer Dinwiddie Talks $26M Raise for Social Crypto App Calaxy
entry.summary: Spencer Dinwiddie's creator token platform Calaxy has raised another $26 million in funding. Dinwiddie tells Decrypt's Stacy Elliott what makes Calaxy stand out and why it can succeed.

entry.title: How To Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder Rebecca Lamis
entry.summary: Rebecca Lamis, who co-founded UnicornDAO with Nadya Tolokonnikova of the band Pussy Riot, sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson in Justin Aversano's new Quantum Art physical NFT space to discuss diversity and inclusion in Web3.

entry.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA
entry.summary: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.

entry.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next
entry.summary: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter
entry.summary: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.

entry.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.

entry.title: gm: DraftKings Goes Crypto
entry.summary: Episode 10 of the gm podcast: Crypto and sports continue to converge, and one of the best examples is DraftKings. CEO Jason Robins joins Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts to talk about how DraftKings is embracing NFTs as prizes, when the company might accept crypto for entry fees and bets, and how his experience dealing with regulators and lawmakers mirrors what crypto companies are now going through in Washington.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?
entry.summary: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.

entry.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse
entry.summary: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable
entry.summary: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.
